original_text: And when she had opened it, she saw the child: and, behold, the babe wept. And she had compassion on him, and said, This is one of the Hebrews' children.
korean_text: 열고 그 아기를 보니 아기가 우는지라 그가 그를 불쌍히 여겨 이르되 이는 히브리 사람의 아기로다

sentences.original_text: And when she had opened it
And she had compassion on him
This is one of the Hebrews' children
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 히브리 사람의 아이 중 하나이다
